analyzed: mi rig pa ni snyan gyis so //

analyzed: 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa zhes pa ni 'jig rten la phan pa mdzad pa la gzhol bar gyur pa'o //

original: bsrung ba gcig pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra las yongs su skyob par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bsrung ba gcig pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra las yongs su skyob par mdzad pa'o //

original: lhag mthong la zhes bya ba la lhag mthong ni shes rab yin te /
analyzed: lhag mthong la zhes bya ba la lhag mthong ni shes rab yin te /

original: de dag la rtag tu spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de dag la rtag tu spyod pa'o //

analyzed: bslab pa gsum ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa ste /

original: de dag la legs par bslabs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de dag la legs par bslabs par gyur pa'o //

original: dul ba'i dngos po gsum ni gcig tu 'jam pa dang / gcig tu rtsub pa dang / 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'o //
analyzed: dul ba'i dngos po gsum ni gcig tu 'jam pa dang / gcig tu rtsub pa dang / 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'o //

original: de la mkhas pa ni mkhyen par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de la mkhas pa ni mkhyen par gyur pa'o //

original: chu bo bzhi ni 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / srid pa'i chu bo dang / lta ba'i chu bo dang / ma rig @8b pa'i chu bo dang / de dag la rgal ba ni pha rol du byon par gyur pa'o //

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa gtso bor gyur pa'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpyod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ste rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po kho na'i zhabs kyi mthil de legs par rab tu gnas par gyur pa'o //

translated: The four bases of supernatural power are the base of supernatural power endowed with the volition that is primarily aspiration, the base of supernatural power endowed with the volition that is primarily mind, the base of supernatural power endowed with the volition that is primarily effort, and the base of supernatural power endowed with the volition that is primarily investigation. The soles of his feet are well placed on the earth because of just these four bases of supernatural power.

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa ste /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa ste /
translated: The four means of gathering disciples are generosity, pleasant speech, purposeful activity, and conformity.

original: de dag la yun ring po nas goms par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de dag la yun ring po nas goms par mdzad pa'o //

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni kye ma'o bdag yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na zhes bya ba nas 'khor rnams la yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyi ba'am /

original: bla gab med pa dag gi zla ba dang / nyi ma la dad pa rnams kyi nyi ma dang / ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa dag gi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / ri gnya' shing 'dzin la gnas pa dag gi thags zangs ris dang /
analyzed: bla gab med pa dag gi zla ba dang / nyi ma la dad pa rnams kyi nyi ma dang / ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa dag gi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / ri gnya' shing 'dzin la gnas pa dag gi thags zangs ris dang /
translated: Those who are faithful to the moon and sun in the open air, the sun and moon; those who live on the terraces of Meru, the Four Great Kings; those who live on Yugandhara, Vemacitrin;

original: ri rab kyi steng na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na gnas pa dag gi tshangs pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: ri rab kyi steng na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na gnas pa dag gi tshangs pa lta bu ste /
translated: those who live on the summit of Meru, Sakra; and those who live in the world of Brahma, Brahma.

original: gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'khor rnams gus par nyan pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de dag dang 'dir mtshungs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'khor rnams gus par nyan pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de dag dang 'dir mtshungs par shes par bya'o //
translated: They are like these because they are the chief, because their retinue listens respectfully, and because they are known to be like them.

original: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rgyur gyur pas shin tu dul ba ni legs par dbang du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rgyur gyur pas shin tu dul ba ni legs par dbang du gyur pa'o //
translated: They are well-controlled because they are the cause of the well-controlled faculties of eye, etc.

original: spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrul ba ni 'khrul pa med par gshegs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrul ba ni 'khrul pa med par gshegs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are unerring in their conduct and behavior because they go, etc., without error.

original: ji lta bur zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bur zhe na /
translated: How are they so?

original: chu gter ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: chu gter ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: They are like the ocean, etc.

original: ting nge ba ni brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge ba ni brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Steadfastness is firmness and stability.

original: chu bo rnams kyi chu gter dang / zhing pa rnams kyi sprin dang / dgon pa pa rnams kyi glang po che'i gtso bo lta bu'o //
analyzed: chu bo rnams kyi chu gter dang / zhing pa rnams kyi sprin dang / dgon pa pa rnams kyi glang po che'i gtso bo lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a reservoir for the rivers, a cloud for the farmers, and a great elephant for the foresters.

original: ma 'dres pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: ma 'dres pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste /
translated: Non-confusion is the application of mindfulness that is not common to others.

original: ye shes kyis gus par nyan pa dang / gus par mi nyan pa dang / gnyi ga ma yin ba dag la kun tu spyod pa rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: ye shes kyis gus par nyan pa dang / gus par mi nyan pa dang / gnyi ga ma yin ba dag la kun tu spyod pa rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: It is the three kinds of conduct in the presence of those who listen respectfully, those who do not listen respectfully, and those who do both.

original: snying rje chen po ni khams gsum gyi sems can la dmigs shing sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rgyud la gnas pa thabs kyis 'jug pa'i 'phags pa'i lam bskyed pa mya ngan las das pa thob par byed pa
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni khams gsum gyi sems can la dmigs shing sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rgyud la gnas pa thabs kyis 'jug pa'i 'phags pa'i lam bskyed pa mya ngan las das pa thob par byed pa
translated: Great compassion is the TathƒÅgata‚Äôs mental continuum, which is focused on the sentient beings of the three realms, is entered through the method of meditative concentration on the aspect of suffering, and generates the noble path that leads to the attainment of nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: ste / zag pa dang bcas pa'i blo dang ldan zing 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: ste / zag pa dang bcas pa'i blo dang ldan zing 'byor pa'o //
translated: It is the endowment with the contaminated mind and the endowment with the resources.

original: nyan thos chen po ni mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis slob mi'i gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos chen po ni mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis slob mi'i gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: The great disciples are the chief disciples, because of their qualities such as the superknowledges.

original: gang gi 'od 'dom gang ba nyi ma stong bas lhag par 'phro ba de ni nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi 'od 'dom gang ba nyi ma stong bas lhag par 'phro ba de ni nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba ste /
translated: He whose light is the size of an armspan, and surpasses the light of a thousand suns, is the one who possesses the light that surpasses a thousand suns.

original: bcom ldan 'das bzhed par gyur pa na 'od rab tu 'bar ba dang bri bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bzhed par gyur pa na 'od rab tu 'bar ba dang bri bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: When the Lord wishes, his light blazes and diminishes.

original: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i @13b nus pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i @13b nus pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Going means having the ability to go and move.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag gis 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag gis 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na /
translated: When the Blessed Lady teaches the Dharma to the assembly with the unshared close mindfulnesses,

original: gus par nyan pa thams cad dang / gus par mi nyan pa thams cad la gcig tu gus par nyan pa dang / gcig tu gus par mi nyan pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gus par nyan pa thams cad dang / gus par mi nyan pa thams cad la gcig tu gus par nyan pa dang / gcig tu gus par mi nyan pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: all those who listen respectfully and all those who do not listen respectfully are the same in being listened to respectfully, and the Blessed One's mind does not change in any other way.

original: pha rol gyi dpung gi tshos 'ong ba rig par bya ba'i phyir dang / lam nyam nga ba yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bzhag pa'i skyes bu ni lag gcan no //
analyzed: pha rol gyi dpung gi tshos 'ong ba rig par bya ba'i phyir dang / lam nyam nga ba yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bzhag pa'i skyes bu ni lag gcan no //
translated: The person who is placed in the position of a sentry to guard a dangerous road and to watch for the approach of an enemy army is called a sentry.

original: chu bo chen po'i pha rol du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir rngan pa ster ba ni gru btsas so //üîΩbka' lung bstan pa ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu lung bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chu bo chen po'i pha rol du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir rngan pa ster ba ni gru btsas so // bka' lung bstan pa ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu lung bstan pa'o //
translated: The person who is placed in the position of a ferryman to carry people across a great river is called a ferryman.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a messenger to carry a message to another country is called a messenger.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a judge to decide a lawsuit is called a judge.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a teacher to instruct others is called a teacher.

original: longs spyod ni yongs su bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: longs spyod ni yongs su bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: The person who is placed in the position of a preceptor to give the vows of a bhiksu is called a preceptor.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a master to give the vows of a sramanera is called a master.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a director to give the vows of a novice is called a director.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a proctor to give the vows of a postulant is called a proctor.

original: na tshod mnyam por gyur pa ne'u ldangs sam grogs po'o //üîΩshi zhing zhes bya ba la ji ltar shi ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: na tshod mnyam por gyur pa ne'u ldangs sam grogs po'o // shi zhing zhes bya ba la ji ltar shi ba yin zhe na /
translated: The person who is placed in the position of a guide to lead a group of travelers on a difficult road is called a guide.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a captain to lead a group of merchants on a difficult road is called a captain.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a ferryman to carry people across a great river is called a ferryman.

original: dus las 'das pa zhes smos te /
analyzed: dus las 'das pa zhes smos te /
translated: The person who is placed in the position of a teacher to instruct others is called a teacher.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a preceptor to give the vows of a bhiksu is called a preceptor.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a master to give the vows of a sramanera is called a master.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a director to give the vows of a novice is called a director.

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i mtha'i skad cig ma'i 'dus zhes bya ba'i bar du byas nas tha ma'i dus thob par gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩnam mkha' ni mkha' dang bar snang ngo //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i mtha'i skad cig ma'i 'dus zhes bya ba'i bar du byas nas tha ma'i dus thob par gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // nam mkha' ni mkha' dang bar snang ngo //
translated: The person who is placed in the position of a proctor to give the vows of a postulant is called a proctor.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a guide to lead a group of travelers on a difficult road is called a guide.üîΩThe person who is placed in the position of a captain to lead a group of merchants on a difficult road is called a captain.

original: rgya mtsho chen po ni chu 'dzin chen po'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po ni chu 'dzin chen po'o //
translated: The person who is placed in the position of a ferryman to carry people across a great river is called a ferryman.üîΩThe

original: drang srong chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te /
analyzed: drang srong chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te /
translated: The great sages are the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones.

original: de dag ni brdzun gsung ba'i ngang tshul can du mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de dag ni brdzun gsung ba'i ngang tshul can du mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: They do not have the nature of speaking falsely.

original: bcom ldan 'das mchog tu zhi ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir rgod pa mi mnga' ba dang ltad mo spangs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mchog tu zhi ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir rgod pa mi mnga' ba dang ltad mo spangs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One is free from agitation and has abandoned idle chatter because he possesses supreme peace.

original: skye bo mang po ni skye bo mang po ste skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po ni skye bo mang po ste skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
translated: The multitude is a large group of people, a crowd of people.

original: tshogs 'di la yod pas na tshogs can no //üîΩpha rol yang de yin la tshogs can yang de yin pa na pha rol tshogs can te /üîΩde'i rgol ba ni phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs can no //
analyzed: tshogs 'di la yod pas na tshogs can no // pha rol yang de yin la tshogs can yang de yin pa na pha rol tshogs can te / de'i rgol ba ni phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs can no //
translated: The one who has this multitude is the one with a multitude.üîΩThe opponent is the one with a multitude of opponents.

original: de 'joms par mdzad pa'i phyir phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs can 'joms par ro //
analyzed: de 'joms par mdzad pa'i phyir phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs can 'joms par ro //
translated: The one who conquers that multitude of opponents is the conqueror of the multitude of opponents.

original: ri dags kyi rgyal po ni seng ge'o //
analyzed: ri dags kyi rgyal po ni seng ge'o //
translated: The king of beasts is the lion.

original: mngon sum du phyogs pa ni der gzhol ba 'am brtson pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum du phyogs pa ni der gzhol ba 'am brtson pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The one who is directly facing is the one who is inclined towards that or who is diligent.

original: 'dam ni nye bar gos pa'am tshogs la bya'o //
analyzed: 'dam ni nye bar gos pa'am tshogs la bya'o //
translated: The mire is that which sticks or is collected.

original: mtho ris kyi gnas gang dag la yod pa de dag ni lha rnams so //
analyzed: mtho ris kyi gnas gang dag la yod pa de dag ni lha rnams so //
translated: The gods are those who exist in the higher realms.

original: nges pa ni gsal por ro //
analyzed: nges pa ni gsal por ro //
translated: The certain ones are the clear ones.

original: rnam par 'phrul pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
translated: The emanations are the emanations of magical power.

original: gzhon nu ni gzhon nu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu ni gzhon nu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The princes are the princes who are anointed as regents.

original: blon po ni rtag tu thag nye bar gnas pa can blo'i grogs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: blon po ni rtag tu thag nye bar gnas pa can blo'i grogs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The ministers are those who always remain nearby and are the companions of the mind.

original: @14a * // grong khyer na gnas pas na grong khyer gyi mi'o //
analyzed: @14a * // grong khyer na gnas pas na grong khyer gyi mi'o //
translated: The citizens are those who live in the city.

original: ljongs na gnas pas na ljongs kyi mi ste /
analyzed: ljongs na gnas pas na ljongs kyi mi ste /
translated: The country people are those who live in the country.

original: ljongs na gnas pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang na gnas pa gang la yod pa de ni ljongs kyi mi'o //
analyzed: ljongs na gnas pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang na gnas pa gang la yod pa de ni ljongs kyi mi'o //
translated: The country people are those who live in the king's palace in the manner of living in the country.

original: 'byung bar brtsams pa ni 'byung ba dang ldan par ro //üîΩzhal 'dzum pa ni zhal gyi mdog dri ma med pa 'am /
analyzed: 'byung bar brtsams pa ni 'byung ba dang ldan par ro // zhal 'dzum pa ni zhal gyi mdog dri ma med pa 'am /
translated: The one who is about to emerge is the one who possesses emergence.üîΩThe one with a smiling face is the one with a stainless complexion on the face,

original: zhal rab tu bzhad par gyur pa'o //üîΩgzugs mdzes pa ni kha dog gi sgo nas so //
analyzed: zhal rab tu bzhad par gyur pa'o // gzugs mdzes pa ni kha dog gi sgo nas so //
translated: or the one who has a very smiling face.üîΩThe one with a beautiful form is the one who is beautiful in terms of color.

original: blta na sdug pa ni dbyibs kyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: blta na sdug pa ni dbyibs kyi sgo nas so //
translated: The one who is pleasant to look at is the one who is beautiful in terms of shape.

original: skye mched dang bar gyur pa ni bzang po'o //
analyzed: skye mched dang bar gyur pa ni bzang po'o //
translated: The good is the one who has the sense bases.

original: gnas med pa ni mi srid pa'o //
analyzed: gnas med pa ni mi srid pa'o //
translated: The impossible is the one who has no abode.

original: skabs med pa ni nges par sbyor du med pa'o //
analyzed: skabs med pa ni nges par sbyor du med pa'o //
translated: The one who has no opportunity is the one who is not definitely connected.

original: nyon mongs par ma gyur pa ni pags pa chig pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: nyon mongs par ma gyur pa ni pags pa chig pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: The one who is not afflicted is the one who has the door of the single hide.

original: gnod par ma gyur pa ni sha tshig pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: gnod par ma gyur pa ni sha tshig pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: The one who is not harmed is the one who has the door of the burnt flesh.

original: skal ba ni khyim gyi bgo skal yin la /
analyzed: skal ba ni khyim gyi bgo skal yin la /
translated: The one who has a share is the one who has a share of the household.

original: de la spyod pa'i phyir bgo skal la spyod pa yin te /üîΩbgo skal las nyams pa'am /
analyzed: de la spyod pa'i phyir bgo skal la spyod pa yin te / bgo skal las nyams pa'am /
translated: Because he enjoys that, he is the one who enjoys a share.

original: bgo skal dang bral bar gyur pa ni skal ba chung ba'o //üîΩbsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bgo skal dang bral bar gyur pa ni skal ba chung ba'o // bsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The one who has lost his share or is deprived of his share is the one who has a small share.

original: bsam pa ni rgya che ba'i chos bshad pa'i rgya chen po nyid la mos shing mngon par 'dod par ro //
analyzed: bsam pa ni rgya che ba'i chos bshad pa'i rgya chen po nyid la mos shing mngon par 'dod par ro //
translated: The one who has a vast intention is the one who has a vast intention for the vast Dharma teaching.

original: bag nyal ni nyon mongs pa dag cing drag pa'i kun tu spyod pa ste /
analyzed: bag nyal ni nyon mongs pa dag cing drag pa'i kun tu spyod pa ste /
translated: The one who has a latent tendency is the one who has a pure and intense practice of the afflictions.

original: nyon mongs pa gang dang gang gis gnod par gyur pa de dang de la rjes su mthun pa'i chos ston pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa gang dang gang gis gnod par gyur pa de dang de la rjes su mthun pa'i chos ston pa'o //
translated: The one who has a counteragent is the one who teaches the Dharma in accordance with whatever afflictions harm him.

original: khams ni rigs yin te /
analyzed: khams ni rigs yin te /
translated: Constituent is the family.

original: kha cig ni rtsub pa ma yin pa'i chos dang / kha cig ni rtsub pa'i chos bstan pas 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: kha cig ni rtsub pa ma yin pa'i chos dang / kha cig ni rtsub pa'i chos bstan pas 'dul ba'o //
translated: Some are to be disciplined by the teaching of the Dharma of the unpleasant, and some by the teaching of the Dharma of the pleasant.

original: dmyal ba'i gtam rgyud ni rtsub pa yin la /
analyzed: dmyal ba'i gtam rgyud ni rtsub pa yin la /
translated: The story of the hells is unpleasant.

original: mtho ris kyi gtam rgyud ni 'jam pa'o //
analyzed: mtho ris kyi gtam rgyud ni 'jam pa'o //
translated: The story of the heavens is pleasant.

original: rang bzhin ni dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: Nature is the nature of the faculty of faith, etc.

original: dbang po rnon po dang rtul po dbye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po rnon po dang rtul po dbye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the distinction of sharp and dull faculties.

original: lam la rjes su shes pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: lam la rjes su shes pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Subsequent knowledge with regard to the path is the fruit of stream-entry.

original: bsgom pa spang bar bya ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa drug pa spangs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa spang bar bya ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa drug pa spangs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The abandonment of the sixth category of defilements to be abandoned by cultivation is the fruit of once-returning.

original: tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga zag pa med pa'i lam gyis spangs pa ni phyir mi 'od ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga zag pa med pa'i lam gyis spangs pa ni phyir mi 'od ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The abandonment of the five fetters that are in the class of higher fetters by the undefiled path is the fruit of non-returning.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus par spangs pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid do //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus par spangs pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid do //
translated: The complete abandonment of the defilements of the peak of existence is the state of an arhat.

original: drod du gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi me'i snga ltas yin te /
analyzed: drod du gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi me'i snga ltas yin te /
translated: The roots of virtue belonging to the stage of heat are a precursor of the fire of the noble path.

original: des bskyed pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos @14b su 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: des bskyed pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos @14b su 'gyur ba'o //
translated: That which is generated by it is the Dharma of complete nirvana.

original: rtse mo dang bzod pa bskyed pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rtse mo dang bzod pa bskyed pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The generation of the peak and patience are similar to that.

original: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi rigs can las thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi rigs can las thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba bskyed pa'o //
translated: One generates the thought of the enlightenment of a ≈õrƒÅvaka means that one generates the virtue that is conducive to liberation in the lineage of a ≈õrƒÅvaka.

original: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs las zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs las zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Similarly, one should add, in the lineage of a pratyekabuddha and a perfect buddha.

original: sangs rgyas la gzhol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor de'i nang du chud par gyur pa dag de lta bur gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la gzhol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor de'i nang du chud par gyur pa dag de lta bur gyur ba yin te /
translated: Those who are intent on the Buddha, etc. are those who have become included in that retinue.

original: bdag gis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di khong du chud par gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: bdag gis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di khong du chud par gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu yin pa de bas na /
translated: All of this is due to the power of the Bhagavat.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med par gyur pa'i gzhi dang 'di nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa las yongs su skyo par mdzad par spyod pa yin la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med par gyur pa'i gzhi dang 'di nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa las yongs su skyo par mdzad par spyod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the Bhagavat is the basis of the immeasurable collection of good qualities and the practice of being completely disgusted with all the sufferings of cyclic existence.

analyzed: rnam par 'jig pa ni 'gyur ba med par 'jig pa'o //

original: 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i @16b chos gang yin pa de dag ni nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa dag gi chos su gdon mi za bar 'gyur bas yin no //

analyzed: 'dis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i ston pa nyid brnyes par ston to //
translated: This shows that he has attained the state of a teacher who does not return.

original: bskal ba dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i phyir 'jig rten mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: bskal ba dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i phyir 'jig rten mkhyen pa'o //
translated: He is the knower of the world because he knows the world with and without outflows.

original: 'dis ni ston pa'i mdzad pa dang po bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni ston pa'i mdzad pa dang po bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows the first of the teacher‚Äôs activities.

original: ston pa'i mdzad pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: ston pa'i mdzad pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The teacher‚Äôs activities are of two kinds:

original: skal ba dag ldan pa dang skal ba dang mi ldan pa so sor tog pa ni dang po yin la /
analyzed: skal ba dag ldan pa dang skal ba dang mi ldan pa so sor tog pa ni dang po yin la /
translated: the first is the teaching of those who are ready for the teaching and those who are not ready;

original: skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'don pa ni gnyis pa yin pa de'i phyir 'jig rten rig pa zhes bya ba 'dis dang po bstan pa'o //
analyzed: skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'don pa ni gnyis pa yin pa de'i phyir 'jig rten rig pa zhes bya ba 'dis dang po bstan pa'o //
translated: the second is the teaching of those who are ready. Therefore, the first is shown by the phrase ‚Äúknower of the world.‚Äù

original: gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba smos te /üîΩskyes bu kha na gdul bya yin te /
analyzed: gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba smos te / skyes bu kha na gdul bya yin te /
translated: The second is shown by the phrase ‚Äúthe charioteer who tames the untamed.‚ÄùüîΩThe untamed are those who are to be tamed.

original: 'dul bar 'os pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skyes bu 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: 'dul bar 'os pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skyes bu 'dul ba'o //
translated: They are untamed because they are fit to be tamed.

original: de dag gi kha lo sgyur ba ni 'dul bar mdzad pa'o //üîΩkha lo sgyur ba'i khyad par ni bla na med pa zhes bya ba yin te /üîΩsor phreng can la @18a * //
analyzed: de dag gi kha lo sgyur ba ni 'dul bar mdzad pa'o // kha lo sgyur ba'i khyad par ni bla na med pa zhes bya ba yin te / sor phreng can la @18a * //
translated: The driver is the one who tames.

original: sogs pa gdul dka' ba 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i bsod nyams la rjes su sbyor ba dang / bdag nyid ngal ba la rjes su sbyor ba yongs su spangs nas bde bar 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang / yang phyir zlog pa med par 'dul ba'i phyir kha lo sgyur ba bla na med ba'o //
analyzed: sogs pa gdul dka' ba 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i bsod nyams la rjes su sbyor ba dang / bdag nyid ngal ba la rjes su sbyor ba yongs su spangs nas bde bar 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang / yang phyir zlog pa med par 'dul ba'i phyir kha lo sgyur ba bla na med ba'o //
translated: The driver is unsurpassed, because he tames those difficult to tame, such as A·πÖgulimƒÅla, and because he tames by means of happiness, having abandoned the practice of sensual indulgence and the practice of self-mortification, and because he tames without turning back.

original: 'dis ni skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'don la par mdzad pa ston pa'i phrin pa'i phrin las gnyis pa bstan te //
analyzed: 'dis ni skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'don la par mdzad pa ston pa'i phrin pa'i phrin las gnyis pa bstan te //
translated: This shows his activity of teaching in accordance with the spiritual gene. This is the second activity of teaching.

original: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni lha dang mi rnams ni ston pa'i gnag zag mdzad pa'i snod yin gyi gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no zhes ston pa'i phrin las kyis snod bstan to //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni lha dang mi rnams ni ston pa'i gnag zag mdzad pa'i snod yin gyi gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no zhes ston pa'i phrin las kyis snod bstan to //
translated: The expression teacher of gods and men indicates the teacher's activity of being a vessel for the performance of the function of teaching. It shows that gods and men are the vessels for the performance of the function of teaching, but that no others are.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas ; ni rab tu grangs pa'i sangs rgyas ta bcom ldan 'das so //üîΩde bas na don 'dis ni sangs rgyas zhes rab tu grags pa gang yin pa'i de ni ston pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas ; ni rab tu grangs pa'i sangs rgyas ta bcom ldan 'das so // de bas na don 'dis ni sangs rgyas zhes rab tu grags pa gang yin pa'i de ni ston pa yin te /
translated: The expression the Blessed One, the Buddha indicates the Buddha's function of being a vessel for the performance of the function of teaching. The word Buddha means one who has fully awakened, and Blessed One means one who has destroyed the afflictions.

original: sngar smos pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar smos pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, this expression indicates that the teacher is the one who is renowned as Buddha, because he possesses the previously mentioned qualities.

original: rgyal srid ni bdag po'o //
analyzed: rgyal srid ni bdag po'o //
translated: The word king means lord, and kingdom means domain.

original: de byed bcug pa ni gzhan blon po la sogs pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de byed bcug pa ni gzhan blon po la sogs pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: The word having means having caused to do.

original: 'byo pa zhes bya ba ni zhing pa dang phyugs skyong ba yul gyi yon tan dang tshong pa dang rgyal po bsten pa bdag po'i yon tan las grub pa'i rgyal srid gang la yod pa de ni 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: 'byo pa zhes bya ba ni zhing pa dang phyugs skyong ba yul gyi yon tan dang tshong pa dang rgyal po bsten pa bdag po'i yon tan las grub pa'i rgyal srid gang la yod pa de ni 'byor pa'o //
translated: The term prosperous means that a kingdom is prosperous when it is endowed with the qualities of the land, such as farmers and cattle herders, and the qualities of the ruler, such as merchants and the service of the king.

original: rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni tshang med pa dang / legs par bskyangs pa'i sgo nas gang du nang gi gter mngon par 'phel bar gyur pa de ni rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni tshang med pa dang / legs par bskyangs pa'i sgo nas gang du nang gi gter mngon par 'phel bar gyur pa de ni rgyas pa'o //
translated: The term flourishing means that a kingdom is flourishing when its internal wealth increases through the absence of waste and good governance.

original: bdag pos pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi rnam par tshe ba las bsrungs pa ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: bdag pos pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi rnam par tshe ba las bsrungs pa ni bde ba'o //
translated: The term peaceful means that a kingdom is peaceful when it is protected from the harm of invading armies.

original: lo legs pa zhes bya ba ni bdag po dang / ljongs kyi mi dag lha dang ldan pa nyid kyis dus ji lta ba bzhin du lhas char 'debs shing 'bru rgyas pas slong mo legs par rnyed pa'i phyir rgyal srid lo legs pa'o //
analyzed: lo legs pa zhes bya ba ni bdag po dang / ljongs kyi mi dag lha dang ldan pa nyid kyis dus ji lta ba bzhin du lhas char 'debs shing 'bru rgyas pas slong mo legs par rnyed pa'i phyir rgyal srid lo legs pa'o //
translated: The term abundant means that a kingdom is abundant when it is abundant with grain, because alms are easily obtained due to the timely rainfall of the gods and the abundance of crops, through the virtue of the ruler and the people of the country.

original: mi ni gnyen dang rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba skye bo 'khor dang 'gron po yangs shing rgya che ba mang por gyur pa gag yin pa de ni skye bo mang po'o //
analyzed: mi ni gnyen dang rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba skye bo 'khor dang 'gron po yangs shing rgya che ba mang por gyur pa gag yin pa de ni skye bo mang po'o //
translated: A country is a place where many people live, where there are many relatives, kings, servants, retinues, guests, and so on.

original: gnag pa ni mang po dang ldan par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gnag pa ni mang po dang ldan par gyur pa ste /
translated: It is a country because it is filled with many people.

original: grong pa la sogs pas mchad pa'i rgyal srid gang la yod pa de ni mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba'o //
analyzed: grong pa la sogs pas mchad pa'i rgyal srid gang la yod pa de ni mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba'o //
translated: A country is filled with people and many beings, where there is a kingdom that is ruled by a king and so on.

original: 'thab mo zhes bya bla la sogs pa la 'thab mo ni bya ba ma yin pa la chags pa'am /
analyzed: 'thab mo zhes bya bla la sogs pa la 'thab mo ni bya ba ma yin pa la chags pa'am /
translated: A country is a place where there is fighting, where there is attachment to non-virtuous actions,

original: gtong bar dka' ba'o //
analyzed: gtong bar dka' ba'o //
translated: or where it is difficult to give up.

original: 'thab pa ni skye bo dag khro ba la phyir khro ba'o //
analyzed: 'thab pa ni skye bo dag khro ba la phyir khro ba'o //
translated: A country is a place where people are angry and retaliate with anger.

original: nang 'khrug ni 'ga' zhig gis rang gi @18b tshogs 'khrug pa slong pa gang yin pa de la bya'o //
analyzed: nang 'khrug ni 'ga' zhig gis rang gi @18b tshogs 'khrug pa slong pa gang yin pa de la bya'o //
translated: A country is a place where some people incite their own group to fight.

original: phyi'i dgra ni pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyis dkrugs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dgra ni pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyis dkrugs pa'o //
translated: A country is a place that is disturbed by the army of enemies.

original: chom rkun ni rkun po'o //
analyzed: chom rkun ni rkun po'o //
translated: A country is a place where there are thieves.

original: phyugs pa ni gser la sogs pas so //
analyzed: phyugs pa ni gser la sogs pas so //
translated: A country is a place where there is theft of gold and so on.

original: nor che ba ni ma la sogs pas so //
analyzed: nor che ba ni ma la sogs pas so //
translated: Great wealth is from his mother, etc.

original: longs spyod che ba ni grong la sogs pas so //
analyzed: longs spyod che ba ni grong la sogs pas so //
translated: Great enjoyment is from his village, etc.

original: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: He has a vast and extensive retinue, etc.

original: 'di'i yongs su bzung pa yangs shing rgya che ba ste /
analyzed: 'di'i yongs su bzung pa yangs shing rgya che ba ste /
translated: His retinue is vast and extensive.

original: 'di'i 'khor mang zhing rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩnor la grangs med pa nyid kyi phyir rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i 'khor mang zhing rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // nor la grangs med pa nyid kyi phyir rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This means that his retinue is large and extensive.üîΩHe is equal to Vaisravana in wealth because his wealth is immeasurable.

original: rtag tu gtong ba'i dang tshul can nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa ste /
analyzed: rtag tu gtong ba'i dang tshul can nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa ste /
translated: He is equal to Vaisravana in wealth because he is always disposed to generosity.

original: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor btang bas yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ba bzhin du 'di'i yang btang bas zad par mi gyur ba'i phyir 'gran pa'o //
analyzed: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor btang bas yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ba bzhin du 'di'i yang btang bas zad par mi gyur ba'i phyir 'gran pa'o //
translated: He is equal to Vaisravana in that his wealth is never exhausted by giving it away, just as Vaisravana's is not.üîΩHe is endowed with the Dharma, etc.

original: chos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos dang ma bral ba ni chos dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos dang ma bral ba ni chos dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with the Dharma because he is not divorced from the Dharma.

original: bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan pa ni bya ba la bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan pa ni bya ba la bstan pa'o //
translated: The discourse that is taught is the teaching of the action.

original: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa ni sbyin pa la rnam par bkod pa'o //üîΩyang dag par gzengs pa stod pa ni tshe 'di nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa'i phan yon brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa ni sbyin pa la rnam par bkod pa'o // yang dag par gzengs pa stod pa ni tshe 'di nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa'i phan yon brjod pa'o //
translated: The discourse that is caused to be taken up is the establishment in generosity.üîΩThe discourse that is encouraged is the expression of the benefits of generosity, etc. in this very life.

original: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi phan yon ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi phan yon ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The discourse that is delighted in is the teaching of the benefits in future lives.üîΩThe discourse that is perfectly completed is the teaching of the benefits of the perfections.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la bzhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la bzhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The discourse that is well-spoken is the teaching of the benefits of the powers, etc.

original: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs bzhugs pa gal ga ste /üîΩphyogs de logs su thal mo sbyar ba dang lus kyi phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs bzhugs pa gal ga ste / phyogs de logs su thal mo sbyar ba dang lus kyi phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The discourse that is well-proclaimed is the teaching of the benefits of the path.

original: na bza' ni snam sbyar la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: na bza' ni snam sbyar la sogs pa'o //
translated: The discourse that is seen is the teaching of the benefits of the fruits.

original: gnas ma / ni khri dang khri'u la sogs pa ste /üîΩgang la dge slong dag nyal zhing 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: gnas ma / ni khri dang khri'u la sogs pa ste /üîΩgang la dge slong dag nyal zhing 'dug pa'o //

original: bsnyun pa dag gi rkyen te bsnyun zlog par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi sman no //
analyzed: bsnyun pa dag gi rkyen te bsnyun zlog par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi sman no //
translated: The reason for the cure of the sick is the medicine.

original: de bas na bsnyung ba'i rkyen yang de nyid yin la sman yang de dag yin pa'am /
analyzed: de bas na bsnyung ba'i rkyen yang de nyid yin la sman yang de dag yin pa'am /
translated: Therefore, they are the reason for the sick, and they are the medicine.

original: bsnyung ba'i rkyen te tshad ma dang / skyabs dang rten par bya ba ni bsnyung ba'i rkyen sman dag nyid do //
analyzed: bsnyung ba'i rkyen te tshad ma dang / skyabs dang rten par bya ba ni bsnyung ba'i rkyen sman dag nyid do //
translated: Or, the reason for the sick, the standard, the refuge, and the support are the medicines for the sick.

original: 'tsho ba la mkho ba de dag thams cad kyang de dag gis srog skyong bar byed /
analyzed: 'tsho ba la mkho ba de dag thams cad kyang de dag gis srog skyong bar byed /
translated: All of these necessities for life are for the protection of life.

original: yongs su srung bar byed ces bya ba'i dbang du byas nas yod byad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su srung bar byed ces bya ba'i dbang du byas nas yod byad ces bya'o //
translated: They are called requisites from the point of view of complete protection.

original: bzhes par ci gnang zhes bya ba ni zhal gyis bzhes @19a * //
analyzed: bzhes par ci gnang zhes bya ba ni zhal gyis bzhes @19a * //
translated: The phrase if it pleases you means if you agree.

original: par ro // cang mi gsung bar zhes bya ba ni tshig gis gnang ba ni tha ma la pa'i rtags yin pa de bas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang de'i nyal thos rnams ni cang mi gsung sbas gnang bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: par ro // cang mi gsung bar zhes bya ba ni tshig gis gnang ba ni tha ma la pa'i rtags yin pa de bas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang de'i nyal thos rnams ni cang mi gsung sbas gnang bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: The phrase remained silent means that the perfect Buddha and his disciples agreed by remaining silent. This is the sign of the last of the three requests. Therefore, the perfect Buddha and his disciples agreed by remaining silent.

original: lan du ma ni lan mang du'o //
analyzed: lan du ma ni lan mang du'o //
translated: Many times means many times.

original: 'dod rgyal du mi gtong ba ni rang dgar me gtong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod rgyal du mi gtong ba ni rang dgar me gtong ba'o //
translated: Not letting it go to waste means not letting it go to waste on its own.

original: bzang po ni mchog yin te /
analyzed: bzang po ni mchog yin te /
translated: Excellent means supreme.

original: bzang po kho na bzang po nyid do //
analyzed: bzang po kho na bzang po nyid do //
translated: Excellent itself is excellence.

original: bshos dag gi bzang po nyid ni bshos bzang po nyid do //
analyzed: bshos dag gi bzang po nyid ni bshos bzang po nyid do //
translated: The excellence of food is the excellence of food.

original: gang du shin tu khyad par 'phags shing bsod pa'i zas bsgrub par nus pa gnag yin pa der bshos gsol bar bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang du shin tu khyad par 'phags shing bsod pa'i zas bsgrub par nus pa gnag yin pa der bshos gsol bar bya ba'i don to //
translated: Where it is possible to prepare very superior and delicious food, there one should eat food. This is the meaning.

original: chur ni chus yongs su bkang ba'i snod gtsang ma'i bye brag go //
analyzed: chur ni chus yongs su bkang ba'i snod gtsang ma'i bye brag go //
translated: In the water means a clean vessel filled with water.

original: gang la da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhe bya ba la /
analyzed: gang la da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhe bya ba la /
translated: When you think it is the right time means when you think it is the right time for that.

original: khyim gyi nang du yang dag par gshegs pa'i mdzad pa gang la da ni chogs pa'i dus la bag par mkhyen nas de mdzad pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: khyim gyi nang du yang dag par gshegs pa'i mdzad pa gang la da ni chogs pa'i dus la bag par mkhyen nas de mdzad pa'i rigs so //
translated: Having entered the house means having entered the house. What should be done means what should be done now. You should know means you should know.üîΩIt is appropriate for you to do that, thinking Now is the time for that.

original: zhes bya ba la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ltos pa'o //
translated: This is the meaning. Looking means looking.

original: dge slong ge tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing zhes bya ba ni 'khor du gyur pa'i dge slong dag gis khyab pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong ge tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing zhes bya ba ni 'khor du gyur pa'i dge slong dag gis khyab pa'o //
translated: He was surrounded by a group of monks means that the retinue of monks was filled.

original: 'khor 'ga' zhig ni sngon nas kyang 'gro bar byed cing phyi bzhin du yang 'brang bar bye pas bye bar tu byed pa ni mdun du bdar nas zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'khor 'ga' zhig ni sngon nas kyang 'gro bar byed cing phyi bzhin du yang 'brang bar bye pas bye bar tu byed pa ni mdun du bdar nas zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Some of the retinue had already gone and were following behind, so leading is mentioned.

original: mdun du bdar ba ni mngon du gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: mdun du bdar ba ni mngon du gshegs pa'o //
translated: Leading is going in front.

original: bkad sa ni der zas thams cad dogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas bshos gsol ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: bkad sa ni der zas thams cad dogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas bshos gsol ba'i gnas so //
translated: The place for the meal is from the perspective of all the food is prepared there.

original: tshim par byed pa ni dbang po'i 'byung ba chen po tshim par byed pa 'dod pa'i zas stobs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshim par byed pa ni dbang po'i 'byung ba chen po tshim par byed pa 'dod pa'i zas stobs par byed pa'o //
translated: Satisfying is satisfying the great elements of the sense faculties, which is to say, providing desirable food.

original: stobs par byed pa ni lhag par 'dod pa stobs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: stobs par byed pa ni lhag par 'dod pa stobs par byed pa'o //
translated: Providing is providing what is particularly desired.

original: phyag bcas pa ni phyag bsil bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyag bcas pa ni phyag bsil bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Having washed the hands, having cooled the hands is mentioned.

original: stan ches dma' ba ni shin tu dma' ba'o //
analyzed: stan ches dma' ba ni shin tu dma' ba'o //
translated: Very low is extremely low.

original: rgyal po'i bkas dril dkrol zhing dam bcas pa gnag gsal por byed pa gang yin pa de ni dril bsgrags pa ste /
analyzed: rgyal po'i bkas dril dkrol zhing dam bcas pa gnag gsal por byed pa gang yin pa de ni dril bsgrags pa ste /
translated: The one who makes the king's order and his promise clear by ringing a bell is the one who rings the bell.

original: dbang phyug gi mchog kha na la 'os pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang phyug gi mchog kha na la 'os pa yin no //
translated: He is the best of the powerful and is not to be despised.

original: 'tshong ba ni 'phral ba kho nar byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'tshong ba ni 'phral ba kho nar byed pa ste /

original: nyi ma bdun po'i tshogs ni nyin zhag bdun pa'o //üîΩgal te yang nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig po bdun pa gsum dag yin pa de lta na yang bdun pa re re yongs su rdzogs pa la skye ba'i tshig yod pa de ma brjod par 'gyur la bdun pa gsum 'ba' zhig brjod na yang bar med pa'i
analyzed: nyi ma bdun po'i tshogs ni nyin zhag bdun pa'o // gal te yang nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig po bdun pa gsum dag yin pa de lta na yang bdun pa re re yongs su rdzogs pa la skye ba'i tshig yod pa de ma brjod par 'gyur la bdun pa gsum 'ba' zhig brjod na yang bar med pa'i
translated: The group of seven suns: seven days.

original: the tshom gyis nyi ma lhag pa srid par 'gyur bas gnyi ga smos pa yin no //
analyzed: the tshom gyis nyi ma lhag pa srid par 'gyur bas gnyi ga smos pa yin no //
translated: If there are three groups of twenty-one days, then the expression ‚Äúday after day‚Äù would not be used for each complete week, and if only the three groups of seven were mentioned, then there would be doubt about the extra days.üîΩTherefore both are mentioned.

original: gsos pa ni khrus dang bsku ma nyes la sogs pa phyi rol gyi mkho ba'i yo byad kyi sgo nas so //üîΩbskyed pa ni nang du gtogs pa'i bza' @24a * //
analyzed: gsos pa ni khrus dang bsku ma nyes la sogs pa phyi rol gyi mkho ba'i yo byad kyi sgo nas so // bskyed pa ni nang du gtogs pa'i bza' @24a * //
translated: Nourished: by external necessities such as bathing, anointing, etc.

original: ba'i khyad par dag gis so //
analyzed: ba'i khyad par dag gis so //
translated: Developed: by internal necessities such as food.

original: bsod pa ni yid dang 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: bsod pa ni yid dang 'thad pa'o //
translated: Good: agreeable.

original: bca' ba ni rtsa ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bca' ba ni rtsa ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Food is roots, etc.

original: bza' ba ni snum khur la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba ni snum khur la sogs pa'o //
translated: Drink is oil-cake, etc.

original: mtshan ma ni sngon sbyin pa dran par byed pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni sngon sbyin pa dran par byed pa'i thabs so //
translated: Sign is the means of remembering the former giving.

original: sgra snyan pa ni sgra mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: sgra snyan pa ni sgra mdzes pa'o //
translated: Sound is the pleasant sound.

original: shes par byas nas zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi yul la pha rol po'i rnam par shes par skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes par byas nas zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi yul la pha rol po'i rnam par shes par skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: Having understood, i.e., having generated the consciousness of the other in the domain of sound.

original: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni thar pa dang rjes su mthun pa ste /
analyzed: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni thar pa dang rjes su mthun pa ste /
translated: Conducive to liberation is in accordance with liberation.

original: gang zag gang la skyes na nges par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos su 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang zag gang la skyes na nges par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos su 'gyur ba'o //
translated: When it arises in a person, it becomes the dharma of certain parinirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: bos pa ni nye bar bstan pa'am go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: bos pa ni nye bar bstan pa'am go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: Calling is the indication or the understanding,

original: gang gi phyir go bar byed pa ni 'bod don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir go bar byed pa ni 'bod don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the purpose of calling is the understanding.

original: ri brags ni mtha' 'khob kyi grong ngo //
analyzed: ri brags ni mtha' 'khob kyi grong ngo //
translated: A mountain village is a border town.

original: bskyod pa ni rab tu bsgul ba'o //
analyzed: bskyod pa ni rab tu bsgul ba'o //
translated: Shaking is a strong trembling.

original: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur pa //
analyzed: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur pa //
translated: Whatever beings have come here,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: 'byung po gang dag ces bya ba ni nyan pa po'i skye bo dag la nges par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung po gang dag ces bya ba ni nyan pa po'i skye bo dag la nges par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The beings are the people who are listening.

original: 'byung pos ni snang ba dang mi snang ba'i sems can no //
analyzed: 'byung pos ni snang ba dang mi snang ba'i sems can no //
translated: The beings are the sentient beings who are visible and invisible.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni chos nyan pa'i sa phyogs su'o //üîΩlhags par gyur pa ni 'khod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni chos nyan pa'i sa phyogs su'o // lhags par gyur pa ni 'khod pa ste /
translated: Here is the place where the Dharma is being heard.

original: chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The come is the sitting down, the abiding, in order to listen to the Dharma.

original: sa'am zhes bya ba ni sa la gnas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sa'am zhes bya ba ni sa la gnas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The or is the abiding on the ground.üîΩThe or is the abiding in the sky, in the atmosphere.

original: 'on te bar snang 'khod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' bar snang la gnas pa rnams byams pa ni skye dgu rnams la phan pa'i sems so //üîΩbyed pa ni sgrub par byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'on te bar snang 'khod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' bar snang la gnas pa rnams byams pa ni skye dgu rnams la phan pa'i sems so // byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa'am /
translated: Loving kindness is the thought of benefit for all beings.

original: sgom par byed pa'o //üîΩbsam pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas /
analyzed: sgom par byed pa'o // bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas /
translated: The practice is the accomplishment or the cultivation.

original: sbyor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni nyin dang mtshan du zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sbyor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni nyin dang mtshan du zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Having taught the perfection of thought, he teaches the perfection of application: Day and night and so on.

original: nyin mo dang mtshan mo rtag tu chos de legs par spyad pa spyod par gyur cig pa'o //
analyzed: nyin mo dang mtshan mo rtag tu chos de legs par spyad pa spyod par gyur cig pa'o //
translated: Day and night, may they always practice the Dharma well.

original: che ba ni dngos po rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: che ba ni dngos po rgya che ba'o //
translated: Great means extensive.

original: mos pa can ni mngon par 'dod pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: mos pa can ni mngon par 'dod pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who is devoted is one who has devotion.

original: ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba ni nyams su myong ba'am /
analyzed: ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba ni nyams su myong ba'am /
translated: One who is known to be without faith is one who has no faith.

original: gsal por gyur pa'o //üîΩrin thang cha bar gyur pa'i phyir rin thang che ba 'am /
analyzed: gsal por gyur pa'o // rin thang cha bar gyur pa'i phyir rin thang che ba 'am /
translated: One who is clear is one who is manifest.üîΩOne who is of great value is one who is of great worth.

original: mi chen po la 'os pa'i phyir chen po la 'os pa'o //
analyzed: mi chen po la 'os pa'i phyir chen po la 'os pa'o //
translated: One who is worthy of great people is one who is worthy of great people.

original: snyan pa dang yid du 'ong ba las shin tu snyan pas na snyan cing mnyen pa'o //
analyzed: snyan pa dang yid du 'ong ba las shin tu snyan pas na snyan cing mnyen pa'o //
translated: One who is very pleasant is one who is very pleasing.

original: 'jigs su rung ba ni byad ngan pas /
analyzed: 'jigs su rung ba ni byad ngan pas /
translated: One who is fearful is one who is ugly.

original: skyo ba'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: skyo ba'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
translated: One who is a source of sorrow is one who is a source of sorrow.

original: dad pa 'bri ba ni de la mi phyogs pa ste /
analyzed: dad pa 'bri ba ni de la mi phyogs pa ste /
translated: One who is without faith is one who is not inclined to faith.

original: @24b yid dang mi 'thad pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: @24b yid dang mi 'thad pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who is not pleasing is one who is not pleasing.

original: tshigs su bcad pa ni sdeb sbyor gyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag ste tshig gi bkod pa'o //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa ni sdeb sbyor gyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag ste tshig gi bkod pa'o //
translated: A verse is a particular arrangement of words in a metrical form.

original: gang dag gzugs la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gang dag gzugs la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Those who are attached to form, etc.

original: gsal rgyal la sogs pa'i sems can gang dag legs can gang dag legs par bshad pa'i sems dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la tshod 'dzin pa ni pha rol po mthong nas kha dog dang dbyibs tsam gyi sgo nas de mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa dagüîΩla tshod 'dzin par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gsal rgyal la sogs pa'i sems can gang dag legs can gang dag legs par bshad pa'i sems dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la tshod 'dzin pa ni pha rol po mthong nas kha dog dang dbyibs tsam gyi sgo nas de mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa dag la tshod 'dzin par byed pa ste /
translated: Those sentient beings such as Prasenajit who are good, who are endowed with a good mind, are limited by form, because they are limited by beauty and ugliness in terms of color and shape when they see others.

original: yon tan dang skyon dang ldan pa nyid du khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan dang skyon dang ldan pa nyid du khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not understand that they are endowed with good qualities and faults.

original: nga'i zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bzang snyan bdag nyid smra ba ste /
analyzed: nga'i zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bzang snyan bdag nyid smra ba ste /
translated: The noble one says, ‚ÄúI am,‚Äù because he speaks of himself.

original: gang dag gis nga la gzugs su shes pa yon tan gyi sgo nas ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang dag gis nga la gzugs su shes pa yon tan gyi sgo nas ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that he does not know me in terms of good qualities, but in terms of form.

original: sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba ni dbyangs snyan pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba ni dbyangs snyan pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: Following sound means following pleasant sounds.

original: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags dbang du ldan pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi 'dod pas byed pa thob par 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags dbang du ldan pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi 'dod pas byed pa thob par 'gyur pa ste /
translated: Being controlled by desirous attachment means being controlled by the desire for sexual intercourse.

original: gang gi phyir de gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pas gzugs la sogs pa mdzes pa tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pas gzugs la sogs pa mdzes pa tshol bar byed do //
translated: Because he is under the control of another, he seeks out beautiful forms, etc.

original: skye bo de yis nga mi mthong //
analyzed: skye bo de yis nga mi mthong //
translated: That person does not see me.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dag la yon tan gzhan shin tu rtog pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar na de dag gis nga shes par mi 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dag la yon tan gzhan shin tu rtog pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar na de dag gis nga shes par mi 'gyur pa'o //
translated: This is because those who are under the control of desire have no ability to imagine other qualities.

original: ji ste nang la rnam shes kyang //
analyzed: ji ste nang la rnam shes kyang //
translated: If consciousness is also internal,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gal te nang gi byed pas de tshod 'dzin par byed na phyi rol dag kyang ma mthong ba'i phyir mig gis kyang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gal te nang gi byed pas de tshod 'dzin par byed na phyi rol dag kyang ma mthong ba'i phyir mig gis kyang mi mthong ngo //
translated: If the internal agent controls it, then the eye also does not see external objects because it does not see them.

original: nang gi mnyam par gzhag pa'i 'bras bu ni nang gi 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: nang gi mnyam par gzhag pa'i 'bras bu ni nang gi 'bras bu ste /
translated: The internal result is the result of internal concentration.

original: de lta bu'i dang tshul 'di la yod pa'i phyir de 'dir nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i dang tshul 'di la yod pa'i phyir de 'dir nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba'o //
translated: Because this principle exists here, it is the internal result that is seen here.

original: de yang sgras ni khrid pa yin zhes bya ba ni ngag gi sgra'i sgo nas lam la gzhag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de yang sgras ni khrid pa yin zhes bya ba ni ngag gi sgra'i sgo nas lam la gzhag par gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase and by sound, guidance means that they are established on the path by means of the sound of speech.

original: phyi rol 'bras bu mthong bar byed pa ni gzugs tsam snying por 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: phyi rol 'bras bu mthong bar byed pa ni gzugs tsam snying por 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: They are those who see external results because they are inclined to grasp form alone as essential.

original: kun tu bsgribs pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas bsgribs pa 'dis nang dang phyi rol du bcas pa khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro //üîΩci ste nang la 'ang zhes bya ba ni gal te yang zag pa med pa'i stobs sam /
analyzed: kun tu bsgribs pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas bsgribs pa 'dis nang dang phyi rol du bcas pa khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro // ci ste nang la 'ang zhes bya ba ni gal te yang zag pa med pa'i stobs sam /
translated: They are completely obscured because they do not understand the internal and external.

original: sha'i mig gis nang dang phyi rol du bcas pa'i rnam par mthong ba'o //üîΩbstan pa de ni gzhan du bkris mi 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: sha'i mig gis nang dang phyi rol du bcas pa'i rnam par mthong ba'o // bstan pa de ni gzhan du bkris mi 'dod pa ste /
translated: If they also see internally, then they see the internal and external with the eye of insight that is free from impurity.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa las bskyod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde nyid @25a * //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa las bskyod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // de nyid @25a * //
translated: That teaching is not desired elsewhere because it cannot be shaken from the understanding of reality.

original: las 'byung ba'i shes rab can zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: las 'byung ba'i shes rab can zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is the insight that arises from that because it arises from that teaching.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu khong du chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu khong du chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of endowed with the mind that has penetrated the result of nirvana is the same.

original: 'phags pa'i lam gyis stobs kyis shes bzhin dad pa rnyed pa las nang du mi 'dod pa bshad pa yin no /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam gyis stobs kyis shes bzhin dad pa rnyed pa las nang du mi 'dod pa bshad pa yin no /
translated: The meaning of having attained faith through the power of the noble path is explained as not desiring the inner.

original: blta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba ni blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: blta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba ni blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The meaning of inexhaustible to behold is not satisfied by seeing.

original: yid tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba ni dad pas sems rgyas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yid tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba ni dad pas sems rgyas par byed pa'o //
translated: The meaning of gratifying the mind is expanding the mind through faith.

original: ku ku ta ya zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: ku ku ta ya zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Kukku·π≠a means rooster.

original: ku ku zhes sgra 'byin par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ku ku zhes sgra 'byin par byed pa ste /
translated: Kukku means to make a sound.

original: khu byug rab tu dga' ba skyes pa na sgra'i bye brag mi gsal bar ku ku zhes sgrogs par byed do //
analyzed: khu byug rab tu dga' ba skyes pa na sgra'i bye brag mi gsal bar ku ku zhes sgrogs par byed do //
translated: When a rooster is very happy and produces a sound, it cries out indistinctly with the sound kukku.

original: las drug la dga' ba zhes bya ba la /üîΩmchod sbyin byed pa ni bdag nyid mchod sbyin byed pa'o //
analyzed: las drug la dga' ba zhes bya ba la / mchod sbyin byed pa ni bdag nyid mchod sbyin byed pa'o //
translated: The meaning of delighting in the six actions is as follows.üîΩ Sacrificing oneself means sacrificing oneself.

original: mchod sbyin byed du bcug pa ni mkhan por gyur pa'i sgo nas gzhan mchod sbyin byed du bcug pa'o //
analyzed: mchod sbyin byed du bcug pa ni mkhan por gyur pa'i sgo nas gzhan mchod sbyin byed du bcug pa'o //
translated: Sacrificing others means causing others to sacrifice through becoming a preceptor.

original: 'don pa ni bdag nyid 'don pa'o //
analyzed: 'don pa ni bdag nyid 'don pa'o //
translated: Recitation is recitation by oneself.

original: 'don du bcug pa ni gzhan 'don du bcug pa'o //
analyzed: 'don du bcug pa ni gzhan 'don du bcug pa'o //
translated: Recitation by another is recitation by another.

original: sbyin pa ni bram zes bram ze la'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa ni bram zes bram ze la'o //
translated: Giving is by a Brahmin to a Brahmin.

original: len pa ni rigs gsum po las bram ze mi len pas na de dag ni las drug yin no //
analyzed: len pa ni rigs gsum po las bram ze mi len pas na de dag ni las drug yin no //
translated: Taking is not by a Brahmin from the other three castes. These are the six actions.

original: de la dga' ba ni mngon par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de la dga' ba ni mngon par sbyor ba'o //
translated: Delight is application.

original: dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la yongs su sdo ba byed pa ni smon lam mo //
analyzed: dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la yongs su sdo ba byed pa ni smon lam mo //
translated: The vow is the resolution to enjoy the fruit of virtuous action.

original: gcig tu gnag pa ste gcig tu mi dge ba dang / gcig tu dkar ba ste gcig tu dge ba dang / 'dren ma ste dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las 'dren mar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gcig tu gnag pa ste gcig tu mi dge ba dang / gcig tu dkar ba ste gcig tu dge ba dang / 'dren ma ste dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las 'dren mar gyur pa'o //
translated: One is entirely black, i.e., entirely non-virtuous; one is entirely white, i.e., entirely virtuous; one is mixed, i.e., virtuous and non-virtuous action is mixed.

original: bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: One should train in it means one should accomplish it.

original: skon pa nas rgya shug byo ba ltar zhes ba ni ci ltar rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag skon par blugs par gyur pa na sgra mi gsal ba dang rnam par 'khrugs pa snyan pa dang / bral ba 'byin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshig gi rim ba snyan pa dang bral ba'i yi ge 'don par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skon pa nas rgya shug byo ba ltar zhes ba ni ci ltar rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag skon par blugs par gyur pa na sgra mi gsal ba dang rnam par 'khrugs pa snyan pa dang / bral ba 'byin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshig gi rim ba snyan pa dang bral ba'i yi ge 'don par byed pa'o //
translated: Like the sound of jujubes being roasted in a pan means that just as the sound of jujubes being roasted in a pan is unclear, confused, and unpleasant, so too one utters syllables that lack the pleasant sequence of words.

original: dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba ni dbyangs mdzes par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba ni dbyangs mdzes par gyur pa ste /
translated: Pleasant sound means a beautiful sound.

original: de goms par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de goms par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is cultivated.

original: don dang mi ldan pa dang 'brel pa med pa'i brjod pa ni ngan du smra ba'o //
analyzed: don dang mi ldan pa dang 'brel pa med pa'i brjod pa ni ngan du smra ba'o //
translated: Bad speech is speech that is meaningless and unrelated.

original: ston par byed pa zhes bya ba ni slob pa 'dzin du bcug pa'o //
analyzed: ston par byed pa zhes bya ba ni slob pa 'dzin du bcug pa'o //
translated: Teaching means making a student take up a subject.

original: brjed pa'i don rab tu 'dri bar byed pa ni kun tu 'dri bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: brjed pa'i don rab tu 'dri bar byed pa ni kun tu 'dri bar byed pa'o //
translated: Asking means asking about the meaning of something that has been forgotten.

original: glu dang rol mo'i sgra slob par byed pa'i khang pa ni rol mo'i gnas so //
analyzed: glu dang rol mo'i sgra slob par byed pa'i khang pa ni rol mo'i gnas so //
translated: A place for music is a place where one is taught to sing and play music.

original: yon tan brjod pa ni @25b yon tan sgrogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan brjod pa ni @25b yon tan sgrogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The praise of good qualities is the proclamation of good qualities.

original: rgyud gsum po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rgyud gsum po zhes bya ba la /
translated: The three continuums are the three continuums of the three continuums.

original: rgyud gsum po de dag gi tshogs pa ni rgyud gsum pa ste /
analyzed: rgyud gsum po de dag gi tshogs pa ni rgyud gsum pa ste /
translated: The collection of those three continuums is the three continuums.

original: grangs sngon du 'gro ba gnyis pa yin te de yang ma ning gi rtags zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas rgyud gsum pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: grangs sngon du 'gro ba gnyis pa yin te de yang ma ning gi rtags zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas rgyud gsum pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The second is in the order of numbers, and that is in terms of the neuter sign, which is called the three continuums.

original: rta la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rta la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a horse, etc.

original: sangs rgyas la bstod pa ste rgyud dang po dang / mdo'i don 'dzin par byed pa'i gtam ste rgyud gnyis pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyud yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la bstod pa ste rgyud dang po dang / mdo'i don 'dzin par byed pa'i gtam ste rgyud gnyis pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyud yin no //
translated: The first continuum is the praise of the Buddha, the second continuum is the discourse that holds the meaning of the sutras, and the third continuum is the dedication.

original: rigs pa zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan dag tu yang ngo //
analyzed: rigs pa zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan dag tu yang ngo //
translated: The reason is that it is also at other times.

original: gzhon nu zhes bya ba ni de la gsar du zhugs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu zhes bya ba ni de la gsar du zhugs par gyur pa'o //
translated: The youth is one who has newly entered that.

original: chos thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni yid la byed pa 'dis bcom zhing zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni yid la byed pa 'dis bcom zhing zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are impermanent is the one who conquers and overwhelms with this mental attention.

original: lhung bzed kyi snod ni lhung bzed gzhug pa'i snod do //
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi snod ni lhung bzed gzhug pa'i snod do //
translated: The alms bowl vessel is the vessel for placing the alms bowl.

original: lung thag ni mchan khung gi phyogs su dpyangs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: lung thag ni mchan khung gi phyogs su dpyangs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The cord is the means of hanging it over the shoulder.

original: rgyun ni pags pa'i 'breng du'o //
analyzed: rgyun ni pags pa'i 'breng du'o //
translated: The string is the thread of the skin.

original: rnga ni rdza rnga'o //
analyzed: rnga ni rdza rnga'o //

original: ltebs par mi 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir bya rog gi rkang pa'i rnam pa ltar skud pas gnan pa ni bya rog gi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: ltebs par mi 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir bya rog gi rkang pa'i rnam pa ltar skud pas gnan pa ni bya rog gi rkang pa'o //

original: bslab pa 'dod pa'i phyir bslab pa 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: bslab pa 'dod pa'i phyir bslab pa 'dod pa ste /
translated: The desire for training is the desire for the precepts.

original: de'i dngos po ni de nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de nyid do //

original: bslab pa la gus par byed ces pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bslab pa la gus par byed ces pa'i bar du'o //

original: dra bar 'os pa yin pa'i phyir dra bar bya ba ste de ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dra bar 'os pa yin pa'i phyir dra bar bya ba ste de ma yin pa'o //
translated: The non-net is the net.

original: gos spu can ni be'u phrug go //
analyzed: gos spu can ni be'u phrug go //
